title: CCL Test Suite Schema
description: JSON Schema for CCL (Categorical Configuration Language) test suites

version.description: Version of the test suite format

source.description: Source information for the test cases

nested_tests.description: Array of nested structure test cases (require object construction)

typed_parsing_tests.description: Array of typed parsing test cases (test type inference layer)

algebraic_tests.description: Array of algebraic property test cases (test mathematical properties)

name.description: Unique name for the test case

description.description: Human-readable description of what the test checks

input.description: CCL input string to parse (use \n for newlines)

expected.description: Expected key-value pairs after flat parsing (for flat tests only)

expected_flat.description: Expected key-value pairs after flat parsing (for nested tests)

expected_nested.description: Expected nested object structure after object construction

tags.description: Tags for categorizing and filtering tests

name.description: Unique name for the error test case

description.description: Human-readable description of the error condition

input.description: CCL input string that should cause an error

expected_error.description: Must be true to indicate this is an error test

tags.description: Tags for categorizing and filtering error tests

key.description: The key part of the entry

value.description: The value part of the entry

name.description: Unique name for the typed parsing test case

description.description: Human-readable description of what the typed parsing test checks

input.description: CCL input string to parse (use \n for newlines)

expected_flat.description: Expected key-value pairs after flat parsing (same as regular tests)

expected_typed.description: Expected typed values by path after type inference

parse_options.description: Optional parsing options (defaults to smart parsing if not specified)

tags.description: Tags for categorizing and filtering typed parsing tests

type.description: The inferred type of the value

parse_integers.description: Enable integer parsing (default: true for smart parsing)

parse_floats.description: Enable float parsing (default: true for smart parsing)

parse_booleans.description: Enable boolean parsing (default: true for smart parsing)

name.description: Unique name for the algebraic test case

description.description: Human-readable description of the algebraic property being tested

expected_combined.description: Expected result after combining input1 and input2

tags.description: Tags for categorizing and filtering algebraic tests
